00501   class UCallbackWrapper
00502   {
00503   public:
00504     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage&)=0;
00505     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper() {}
00506   };
00507 
00508 
00511   class UCallbackWrapperF
00512     : public UCallbackWrapper
00513   {
00514     UCallback cb;
00515   public:
00516     UCallbackWrapperF(UCallback cb) : cb(cb) {}
00517     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00518     {
00519       return cb(msg);
00520     }
00521     virtual ~UCallbackWrapperF() {}
00522   };
00523 
00524   class UCallbackWrapperCF
00525     : public UCallbackWrapper
00526   {
00527     UCustomCallback cb;
00528     void* cbData;
00529   public:
00530     UCallbackWrapperCF(UCustomCallback cb, void* cbData)
00531       : cb(cb), cbData(cbData)
00532     {}
00533     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00534     {
00535       return cb(cbData, msg);
00536     }
00537     virtual ~UCallbackWrapperCF() {}
00538   };
00539 
00540   template<class C>
00541   class UCallbackWrapper0 :
00542     public UCallbackWrapper
00543   {
00544     C& instance;
00545     UCallbackAction (C::*func)(const UMessage&);
00546   public:
00547     UCallbackWrapper0(C& instance, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(const UMessage&))
00548       : instance(instance), func(func)
00549     {}
00550     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00551     {
00552       return (instance.*func)(msg);
00553     }
00554     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper0() {}
00555   };
00556 
00557   template<class C, class P1>
00558   class UCallbackWrapper1
00559     : public UCallbackWrapper
00560   {
00561     C& instance;
00562     UCallbackAction (C::*funcPtr)(P1, const UMessage&);
00563     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P1>::type p1;
00564   public:
00565     UCallbackWrapper1(C& instance,
00566                       UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, const UMessage&), P1 p1)
00567       : instance(instance), funcPtr(func), p1(p1)
00568     {}
00569     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00570     {
00571       return (instance.*funcPtr)(p1, msg);
00572     }
00573     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper1()
00574     {}
00575   };
00576 
00577   template<class C, class P1, class P2>
00578   class UCallbackWrapper2 : public UCallbackWrapper
00579   {
00580     C& instance;
00581     UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, const UMessage&);
00582     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P1>::type p1;
00583     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P2>::type p2;
00584   public:
00585     UCallbackWrapper2(
00586       C& instance, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, const UMessage&),
00587       P1 p1, P2 p2)
00588       : instance(instance), func(func), p1(p1), p2(p2)
00589     {}
00590     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00591     {
00592       return (instance.*func)(p1, p2, msg);
00593     }
00594     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper2()
00595     {}
00596   };
00597 
00598 
00599   template<class C, class P1, class P2, class P3>
00600   class UCallbackWrapper3 : public UCallbackWrapper
00601   {
00602     C& instance;
00603     UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, const UMessage&);
00604     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P1>::type p1;
00605     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P2>::type p2;
00606     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P3>::type p3;
00607   public:
00608     UCallbackWrapper3(
00609       C& instance, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, const UMessage&),
00610       P1 p1, P2 p2, P3 p3)
00611       : instance(instance), func(func), p1(p1), p2(p2), p3(p3)
00612     {}
00613     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00614     {
00615       return (instance.*func)(p1, p2, p3, msg);
00616     }
00617     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper3()
00618     {}
00619   };
00620 
00621 
00622   template<class C, class P1, class P2, class P3, class P4>
00623   class UCallbackWrapper4 : public UCallbackWrapper
00624   {
00625     C& instance;
00626     UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, P4, const UMessage&);
00627     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P1>::type p1;
00628     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P2>::type p2;
00629     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P3>::type p3;
00630     typename libport::traits::remove_reference<P4>::type p4;
00631   public:
00632     UCallbackWrapper4(
00633       C& instance, UCallbackAction(C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, P4, const UMessage&),
00634       P1 p1, P2 p2, P3 p3, P4 p4)
00635       : instance(instance), func(func), p1(p1), p2(p2), p3(p3), p4(p4)
00636     {}
00637     virtual UCallbackAction operator ()(const UMessage& msg)
00638     {
00639       return (instance.*func)(p1, p2, p3, p4, msg);
00640     }
00641     virtual ~UCallbackWrapper4()
00642     {}
00643   };
00645   //overloaded callback generators

00649 
00656   inline UCallbackWrapper& callback(UCallback cb)
00657   {
00658     return *new UCallbackWrapperF(cb);
00659   }
00660   inline UCallbackWrapper& callback(UCustomCallback cb, void* data)
00661   {
00662     return *new UCallbackWrapperCF(cb, data);
00663   }
00664 
00665 
00666   template<class C> UCallbackWrapper&
00667   callback(C& ref, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(const UMessage&))
00668   {
00669     return *new UCallbackWrapper0<C>(ref, func);
00670   }
00671 
00672   template<class C, class P1> UCallbackWrapper&
00673   callback(C& ref, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, const UMessage&), P1 p1)
00674   {
00675     return *new UCallbackWrapper1<C, P1>(ref, func, p1);
00676   }
00677 
00678   template<class C, class P1, class P2>  UCallbackWrapper&
00679   callback(C& ref, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, const UMessage&),
00680            P1 p1, P2 p2)
00681   {
00682     return *new UCallbackWrapper2<C, P1, P2>(ref, func, p1, p2);
00683   }
00684 
00685   template<class C, class P1, class P2, class P3> UCallbackWrapper&
00686   callback(C& ref, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, const UMessage&),
00687            P1 p1, P2 p2, P3 p3)
00688   {
00689     return *new UCallbackWrapper3<C, P1, P2, P3>(ref, func, p1, p2, p3);
00690   }
00691 
00692   template<class C, class P1, class P2, class P3, class P4>  UCallbackWrapper&
00693   callback(C& ref, UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1, P2, P3, P4, const UMessage&),
00694            P1 p1, P2 p2, P3 p3, P4 p4)
00695   {
00696     return *new UCallbackWrapper4<C, P1, P2, P3, P4>(ref, func, p1, p2, p3, p4);
00697   }

00703   template<class C>
00704   UCallbackID
00705   UAbstractClient::setCallback(C& ref,
00706                                UCallbackAction (C::*func)(const UMessage&),
00707                                const char* tag)
00708   {
00709     return addCallback(tag,*new UCallbackWrapper0<C>(ref, func));
00710   }

00713   UCallbackID
00714   UAbstractClient::setCallback(C& ref,
00715                                UCallbackAction (C::*func)(P1 , const UMessage&),
00716                                P1 p1, const char* tag)
